关于橄榄油对健康的益处的最新信息研究人员总结了橄榄油对人类健康临床影响的最新证据。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230829/An-update-on-the-health-benefits-of-olive-oil.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230829/An-update-on-the-health-benefits-of-olive-oil.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9150fcfc-8bdf-48e1-9d4d-e1de912b3d4b Tue, 29 Aug 2023 11:46:00 -0400 An update on the health benefits of olive oil
研究调查二手烟烟雾暴露对健康的影响在最近的一项研究中，研究人员评估了长期接触二手烟对认知、行为、神经病理学和新陈代谢的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230829/Study-examines-health-impacts-of-second-hand-香烟-smoke-exposure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230829/Study-examines-health-impacts-of-second-hand-香烟-smoke-exposure.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b3121795-ffe5-4ab4-8ca2-78ac925fd601 Tue, 29 Aug 2023 11:31:00 -0400 Study examines health impacts of second-hand cigarette smoke exposure

研究发现许多病毒后综合症患者暴露于 SARS-CoV-2 的证据研究人员调查了病毒后综合征个体中 SARS-CoV-2 暴露的免疫学和临床结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230829/Study-finds-evidence-of-SARS-CoV-2-exposure-in-many-病人-with-postviral-syndrome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230829/Study-finds-evidence-of-SARS-CoV-2-exposure-in-many-病人-with-postviral-syndrome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2f945c2b-8b36-44bd-b63c-11a5078a39f0 Tue, 29 Aug 2023 11:14:00 -0400 Study finds evidence of SARS-CoV-2 exposure in many patients with postviral syndrome

研究发现种系编码的特异性并不总能预测 B 细胞反应的轨迹研究人员使用计算模拟和实验来研究种系中编码的遗传变异如何影响 B 细胞反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230829/Study-finds-that-germline-encoded-specificities-cannot-always-predict-the-trajectory-of-B-cell-responses.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230829/Study-finds-that-germline-encoded-specificities-cannot-always-predict-the-trajectory-of-B-cell-responses.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fd39efd1-05bd-4034-ba03-f1f2ac2e4f50 Tue, 29 Aug 2023 10:52:00 -0400 Study finds that germline-encoded specificities cannot always predict the trajectory of B-cell responses
你的盘子的重量会让你肥胖吗？携带较重餐具的人更有可能为自己准备比平时更多的食物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230829/Could-the-weight-of-your-serving-dish-make-you-obese.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230829/Could-the-weight-of-your-serving-dish-make-you-obese.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=328c2c05-63a4-49bd-b710-157965ab2416 Tue, 29 Aug 2023 10:46:00 -0400 Could the weight of your serving dish make you obese?
不同饮食结合限盐如何缓解高血压、高血压？最近的一项研究进行了一项临床试验，比较流行的饮食，即控制高血压的饮食方法和地中海饮食，并结合限盐策略来降低高血压。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230829/How-can- Different-diets-combined-with-salt-restriction-alleviate-high-blood-Pressure-and-hypertension.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230829/How-can- Different-diets-combined-with-salt-restriction-alleviate-high-blood-Pressure-and-hypertension.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4b45e28a-861b-4605-8c44-3ac5d9dd6344 Tue, 29 Aug 2023 10:35:00 -0400 How can different diets combined with salt restriction alleviate high blood pressure and hypertension?
